scripts.pretest: rm -rf build && mkdir build && json2module package.json > build/package.js && rollup -c
scripts.prepublish: npm run test && uglifyjs build/d3-simple-tooltip.js -c -m -o build/d3-simple-tooltip.min.js
scripts.postpublish: zip -j build/d3-simple-tooltip.zip -- LICENSE README.md build/d3-simple-tooltip.js build/d3-simple-tooltip.min.js
